name: Thacher Interactive
tag_list: digital, social, website, microsite, landing-page, seo, sem, mobile
overview:
Thacher Interactive is a boutique digital and social media agency based in NYC. We design websites, mobile sites, lead the charge on social media campaigns and essentially do anything in the digital space to grow our clients’ brands.

We work directly with B2C/B brands and also collaborate as a digital vendor for some of the largest general advertising agencies in the world.

We consider social platforms, mobile experiences and websites to all be essential elements in a brand’s digital ecosystem. We love playing a role in any or all of these vital systems as we help develop and grown brand-to-consumer relationships.

Our team of talented professionals are big agency refugees who like working in a hands-on, lean and mean workspace. We like to think of ourselves as the A-Team, except without the van and obvious nicknames.
